data_table.description: This sample attributes table includes body site where sample was extracted, analyte type, tumor status, histological type, sequence in which sample was collected, first and second line of tumor treatment, and name of sequencing center.

variable.name: BODY_SITE
variable.description: Body site where sample was collected

variable.name: IS_TUMOR
variable.value: Is Tumor+Germline/Constitutive DNA analyzed from the case.

variable.name: HISTOLOGICAL_TYPE
variable.description: Cell or tissue type or subtype of sample

variable.name: SAMPLE SEQUENCE
variable.value: Sample collected just before start of Front-line therapy
Sample collected from relapse of Front-line therapy before administering secondary therapy
Constitutive DNA obtained from each patient as internal controls
Sample collected 6 months or before starting Front-line therapy
Sample collected from second relapse after secondary therapy
Sample collected after third relapse from therapies

variable.name: FIRST LINE_TUMOR TREATMENT
variable.description: First line therapy given in each case

variable.name: SECONDARY TUMOR_TREATMENT
variable.value: synthetic oligodeoxynucleotides containing unmethylated CG dinucleotides

variable.name: SEQUENCING_CENTER
variable.description: Name of the center which conducted sequencing
